title: WATCH: Lea, Brad reunite, perform 'A Whole New World'
text:
WATCH: Lea, Brad reunite, perform 'A Whole New World' ABS-CBNnews.com Posted at 10/10/2015 11:35 AM 
MANILA - It was truly a shining, shimmering moment when Lea Salonga and Brad Kane, along with composer Alan Menken and the rest of the cast of the 1992 animated musical film "Aladdin," reunited on Friday on “Good Morning America” to perform live the classic “A Whole New World.” 
It was the first time Salonga and Kane shared the stage to reprise the duet since their appearance at the 1993 Academy Awards, wherein the Disney Ballad won “Best Original Song.” 
"We knew this was going to be the magic carpet ride song," Menken said when asked to describe his inspiration for the song. "And so we just wanted that very romantic feeling of a flight over the city." 
Salonga is currently in New York City as part of the cast of the upcoming Broadway play "Allegiance," which is set to make its debut on November 8.
